PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-03562014-04-03HC,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Consumer Product Safety Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Schedule 2 to the Canada Consumer Product Safety Act (TCEP)
PrecisRegulations Amending SCHEDULE 2 TO THE CANADA CONSUMER PRODUCT SAFETY ACT (TCEP) in order to prohibit the manufacture, import, advertising or sale of consumer products intended for children under three years of age that are made, in whole or in part, of polyurethane foam that contains tris (2-chloroethyl) phosphate.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0079 Publication Date: 2014-04-23
AttachmentsAttachment
